title: Create /config command definition
acceptance_criteria: Command has subcommands: view, api-key, api-key-clear, chat-model, image-models, reset
Subcommand group 'webhook' with: add, list, remove, test
chat-model has autocomplete: true option for model selection
image-models has autocomplete: true option for model selection
webhook remove has autocomplete: true for webhook selection
webhook test has autocomplete: true for webhook selection
guildOnly: true to restrict to servers
